bike.description: C10 super-light carbon monocoque, semi-integrated oversized 1.5" lower head tube, 31.6mm round seat post, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: C10 high-modulus carbon w/ sealed bearing pivots, FSR 120mm travel, 142x12 carbon dropout, CNC'd disc mount and replaceable hanger
